Headline: 112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute at 111th/Whipple
ShortDescription: 112 Vincennes/111th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Western, 115th, Kedzie and 111th over regular route: due to, street blockage near 111th/Whipple.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
